boxed-text.p: Cite this article as: Scalvenzi L, Radice M, Toma L, Severini F, Boccolini D, Bella A, Guerrini A, Tacchini M, Sacchetti G, Chiurato M, Romi R & Di Luca M. 2019. Larvicidal activity of Ocimum campechianum, Ocotea quixos and Piper aduncum essential oils against Aedes aegypti. Parasite 26, 23.
